summary: The diff implements most of the requested features including toast notifications, ad banners, premium redesign, premium modal, language support, and splash screen redesign. However, several specific requirements have gaps or missing details.

missing_requirements.requirement: Toast must respect active language (Bengali or English) for all visible text including timestamp label.
missing_requirements.reason: In NotificationToast.tsx, the text 'এখনই' is hardcoded in Bengali rather than using a translation key, violating the language-aware requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Toast must appear after any trust completion in addition to task completion.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows task completion triggering notifications but there is no explicit evidence that trust/credit item completion triggers the toast notification as specifically required.

missing_requirements.requirement: No hardcoded UI strings outside translations.ts.
missing_requirements.reason: In TaskListPopup.tsx the hint text '২ সেকেন্ড ধরে রাখুন কাজ সম্পন্ন করতে' is hardcoded in Bengali. In Lists.tsx strings like 'আমার তালিকা' and 'My Lists' are hardcoded inline rather than using t() calls.

missing_requirements.requirement: The new logo image must be rendered from the generated asset in frontend/public/assets/generated/ (ssl-logo.dim_512x512.png).
missing_requirements.reason: SplashScreen.tsx uses an inline SVG drawn directly in the component rather than loading the image asset from frontend/public/assets/generated/ssl-logo.dim_512x512.png as specified. No image file was added in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: NotificationProvider context with useNotificationSound hook integration as a global notification architecture.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request asked for toast notifications but did not specify a NotificationContext/NotificationProvider architecture or a useNotificationSound hook. These are unsolicited architectural additions.

hallucinated_features.description: Hold-to-complete mechanic with progress bar in TaskListPopup requiring a 2-second hold to complete a task.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asked for toast notifications to appear after task completion. The specific hold-to-complete interaction pattern with progress tracking was not requested.
